plants.name: Peace Lily
plants.description: The Peace Lily is a beautiful and easy-to-care-for plant known for its air-purifying properties.

plants.name: Snake Plant
plants.description: The Snake Plant is a hardy, low-maintenance plant with striking tall, upright leaves.

plants.name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
plants.description: The Fiddle Leaf Fig is a popular choice for its large, glossy leaves.

plants.name: Succulent Collection
plants.description: This collection includes a variety of beautiful succulents, each with its unique charm.

plants.name: Monstera Deliciosa
plants.description: The Monstera Deliciosa is known for its unique split leaves.

plants.name: Lavender
plants.description: Lavender is a fragrant herb known for its calming aroma.

plants.name: Pothos
plants.description: Pothos, also known as Devil's Ivy, is a low-maintenance trailing vine with heart-shaped leaves.
